short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows load all post related pages into a single one

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is loading the next page of a post (if available) when user reaches the bottom of the page.The operation is repeated until all the posts are displayed into a single page. This extension save user time and add a plus of usability to boredpanda.com
